statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerSurveys
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date, survey_response FROM CustomerSurveys
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date, survey_response FROM CustomerSurveys WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM CustomerSurveys WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT survey_id, survey_response FROM CustomerSurveys WHERE survey_response LIKE '%satisfied%'
SELECT * FROM CustomerSurveys WHERE survey_response LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_surveys FROM CustomerSurveys GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_surveys > 2 ORDER BY total_surveys DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT survey_id, customer_id FROM CustomerSurveys WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, LENGTH(survey_response) as response_length FROM CustomerSurveys ORDER BY response_length DESC, survey_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSurveys WHERE survey_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7) ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, survey_id, survey_date FROM customers JOIN surveys ON customers.customer_id = surveys.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM surveys WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT customer_name, email, survey_date FROM customers INNER JOIN surveys ON customers.customer_id = surveys.customer_id WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT survey_id, rating, feedback FROM surveys WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM surveys WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_surveys FROM customers JOIN surveys ON customers.customer_id = surveys.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id, customer_name;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSurveys
SELECT survey_score, survey_date FROM CustomerSurveys
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM SurveyResponses
SELECT question_text FROM SurveyQuestions
SELECT survey_id, question_id, response_text FROM SurveyResponses
SELECT * FROM CustomerSurveys WHERE survey_score > 80 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date, survey_score FROM CustomerSurveys WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY survey_score ASC;
SELECT s.question_text, sr.response_text FROM SurveyQuestions s JOIN SurveyResponses sr ON s.question_id = sr.question_id WHERE s.survey_id = 1;
SELECT s.question_text, sr.response_text FROM SurveyQuestions s JOIN SurveyResponses sr ON s.question_id = sr.question_id WHERE s.survey_id = 2 ORDER BY s.question_type;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 3 AND response_date >= '2022-01-01' AND response_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT survey_name, description FROM surveys WHERE survey_id > 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT survey_id, survey_name, description FROM surveys ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '(555)%' AND email NOT LIKE '%yahoo.com';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSurvey;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT response_id, survey_id, response_date FROM SurveyResponse WHERE survey_id = 3 ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM Product WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM Service ORDER BY service_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSurvey ORDER BY survey_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT survey_questions FROM CustomerSurvey WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customer WHERE customer_email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM Product WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM Service ORDER BY service_id ASC;
